question: A student got twice as many sums wrong as he got right. If he attempted 48 sums in all, how many did he solve correctly?
A man fixed an appointment to meet the manager, Manager asked him to come two days after the day before the day after tomorrow. Today is Friday. When will the manager expect him?

If 9 men working 6 hours a day can do a work in 88 days. Then 6 men working 8 hours a day can do it in how many days?

In a boat, 25 persons were sitting. Their average weight increased one kilogram when one man goes and a new man comes in. The weight of the new man is 70 kgs. Find the Weight of the man who is going?
A man can row 4.5 km/hr in still water. It takes him twice as long to row upstream as to row downstream. What is the rate of the current?
A sum of money amounts to Rs. 9800 after 5 years and Rs. 12005 after 8 years at the same rate of simple interest. The rate of interest per annum is?

A man starts walking at 3 pm. he walks at a speed of 4 km/hr on level ground and at a speed of 3 km/hr on uphill, 6 km/hr downhill and then 4 km/hr on level ground to reach home at 9 pm. What is the distance covered on one way?

I have a few sweets to be distributed. If I keep 2, 3, or 4 in a pack, I am left with one sweet. If I keep 5 in a pack, I am left with none. What is the minimum number of sweets I have to pack and distribute?
2 trains starting at the same time from 2 stations 200km apart and going in opposite direction cross each other at a distance of 110km from one of the stations. What is the ratio of their speeds?
